# Load data files

## Heat pump profiles

This file is the pre-aggregated data for all heat pump circuits in the GREEN Grid data for April 2015 - March 2016 (check!)

```{r set fileName}
ggParams$profilesFile <- paste0(ggParams$dataLoc, "xxxx")
```

In this section we load and describe the  data files from `r ggParams$profilesFile`.

```{r load data}

print(paste0("Trying to load data from ", ggParams$profilesFile))
dataDT <- data.table::as.data.table(readr::read_csv(ggParams$profilesFile))
```


Describe using skim:

```{r skimRable}
skimr::skim(dataDT)
```

# R environment

R packages used:

 * base R - for the basics [@baseR]
 * data.table - for fast (big) data handling [@data.table]
 * lubridate - date manipulation [@lubridate]
 * ggplot2 - for slick graphics [@ggplot2]
 * readr - for csv reading/writing [@readr]
 * skimr - for skim [@skimr]
 * knitr - to create this document & neat tables [@knitr]
 * nzGREENGrid - for local NZ GREEN Grid project utilities
